entry.title: Of Capes and Cowls (and Coats)
entry.summary:
Author: TheStoryTeller_with_an_Eyepatch

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,648Chapters: 4/4Kudos: 84

Summary: After the events of Trimax, Vash's sisters think their little brother needs a change of scenery.A few universes and almost a thousand years in the past, Gotham's narrows experiences a supernatural power surge that had the potential to blackout the entire city.Gotham's Bat is watching, and our favorite Typhoon finds that a brand new world means brand new problems and brand new people to save.

entry.title: Dome Protocol
entry.summary:
Author: DeaPotteriana

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,926Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: “I think he created the device for an end-of-the-world scenario,” Bruce said, voice carefully neutral.***The future children of Gotham’s Batkids appear in the cave out of thin air, pulled from their time in a flash of light. Now trapped in a dome with their family watching from the outside, they'll have to face a heart-breaking possibility.AKAThe Batkids’ own kids get unknowingly sent to the past and the original Batfam can do nothing but watch.

entry.title: Dynamic Duo
entry.summary:
Author: RiptideUnstruck

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,128Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 535

Summary: In some way, they invariably knew that Dick Grayson was the apple of Bruce’s eye. The first Robin, his first son. Alfred had always said that if it weren’t for Dick, Bruce Wayne would’ve imploded.Dick regresses back to nine years old and the bat clan finally sees who was Bruce Wayne’s first best friend.Spoiler: Batman is suddenly making puns and its giving everyone an aneurysm.

entry.title: Caledonia
entry.summary:
Author: Mnemosyne_Nyx

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,696Chapters: 4/6Kudos: 59

Summary: 5+1 Sequel to "Song of Ilium"The riots are over, Eris is dead and Bruce is home.As the League finishes tying up loose ends, Gotham’s criminal underworld has benefited from the Batman’s absence and calls for its hero. There is work to be done, lives to be saved and soon the Iliad’s downfall becomes another strike in the Justice League’s victory tally. The world and its heroes can move on.But Bruce can’t. And no matter how much he denies it, the cracks are starting to form.

entry.title: Captive of the Demon's Head
entry.summary:
Author: Mrswas

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 18,130Chapters: 5/6Kudos: 81

Summary: Bruce and Damian are taken by the League of Assassins. Bruce must do what he can to keep his son safe, even if it includes letting Talia have what she wants from him, mentally and physically.Also, the timeline and ages are slightly different than canon:League training at 17Talia drugs him at 22Damian is born when he is 23, he gets Damian at 30. Dick adopted at 8 when bruce is 19. Jason comes to the manor when hes 10 and Bruce is 25. Tim a couple years later (early adoption). Duke adopted at 12, Cass at 14, Steph at 14. Current agesBruce 33Dick 22Jason 18Tim 16Duke 14Damian 10Cass 17Oracle 23Steph 16

entry.title: We Have Truly Lost the Plot
entry.summary:
Author: Ihavenotsleptindays

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,176Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 54

Summary: After a fight with a mage goes very wrong, Nightwing and Spoiler are left watching their family members fight within stories. Seeing them get lost within these worlds seeing familiar faces try and trap them.Tim tries to navigate a land of moving castles, fire demons, and wizards.Jason attempts to survive the bloody war between humans, and gods.Bruce tries to ensure two kids survive the massive flooding caused by one becoming human.Damian desperately tries to make sure one stubborn witch doesn't get herself killed.Cass works to navigate the confusing world of spirits all hiding in one bathhouse.

entry.title: I think you're holding the heart of mine
entry.summary:
Author: dont_let_me_grab_the_mic

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,363Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 182

Summary: Pain pulsed through him in time with his slowing heartbeat. His sight flickered in and out of darkness, and the sounds of the city blurred into something distant.He should call someone, anyone really- but instead he just sent a signal, coordinates, something he usually did when he needed backup, then waited for a response.   He waited.   And waited.   ...  or6 times Bruce's children hurt him, +1 time they tried to make it right to him

entry.title: In Alternate Relation
entry.summary:
Author: Effi_Bee

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,640Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 75

Summary: As he lay on his back in the snow, his soon-to-be murderer already long gone, he couldn’t help but find this situation ironically funny. How it started this way. A bullet lodging itself into a chest. The start and -however pathetic- end of Spider-Man. He had gone full circle now. Hilarious.orPeter finds himself in Gotham City, New Jersey, and decides to start a new chapter in his (new) life, because isn't that what you do when you are supposed to be dead? You move on. (It doesn't matter that it's not really working. It's the effort that counts.)

entry.title: Children of Gotham (Cryptid Batfam AU)
entry.summary:
Author: Hawkflame999

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,637Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 139

Summary: Gotham has a Spirit. She Claimed the Bats as Hers.Bruce Wayne went missing the same night his parents' bodies were found. Dick Grayson ran away from foster care, another lost child. Jason Todd was never seen again after one snowy night, even though little effort was made. Cassandra Cain escaped her father and was never seen again, Stephanie Brown was found missing after her father was arrested. Timothy Drake went missing one night at age six. Damian Al Ghul Wayne was said to have disappeared from the ranks of the League of Assassins. Duke Thomas ran away from foster care after his parents were hospitalized and was never seen once more.Shifted, Taken, Changed, Chosen, Marked, and Claimed.Birds of a Feather, Bats of a Cave.The JL is unaware._---Or another crytid Batfam AU.

entry.title: Shadows of Wayne: A Dark Reflection
entry.summary:
Author: theyfwmotherraven

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 982Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 85

Summary: In a world where Batman is dead, his children carry on the legacy in the shadows. When they kidnap an alternate Bruce Wayne who never donned the cape, they find a man more open, more trusting, and a far better father.
